javadoc: Thread responsible for executing a python command for the plugin.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new python plugin execution thread that executes the given command for the given plugin.

params.name: plugin
params.comment: The python plugin to execute the command for.

params.name: moreInputWanted
params.comment: Gets set to indicate that the executed command expects more input.

name: PythonPluginExecutionThread
comment: Thread responsible for executing a python command for the plugin.
